email_body:
Hello [FIRST_NAME]!

We are so excited that you've decided to join us in promoting [FILM_NAME]!

Here if your affiliate link:
[AFFILIATE_LINK]

Remember that you will make $[AFFILIATE_COMMISSION] for everyone who purchases a copy of [FILM_NAME] through your affiliate link. So feel free to promote that link to your audience in the way that you feel will have the largest impact.

You can track your affiliate commission on your dashboard.

Link: [AFFILIATE_DASHBOARD_LINK]
Email:[EMAIL]
Password: [AFFILIATE_PASSWORD]

If you have questions or need help getting started please email us at: affiliates@lifeismymovie.com.

Thanks for helping us spread the important message found in this film!

Sincerely,
[FILM_NAME] - Affiliate Program

Your Screening Is Set!

Thank you for signing up to host a screening of Warehoused!

Below is everything you will need to setup your community screening. We will be sending out occasional emails with helpful hints, updates, and more info to help you host the best screening possible.

Screening order receipt: [RECEIPT_LINK]

Your event page: [SCREENING_EVENT_PAGE_LINK]

Personalize your event page (login information below): [SCREENING_EVENT_EDIT_PAGE_LINK]

WORLD REFUGEE DAY - June 20th, 2017!

If you have any questons please reach out to us at info@lifeismymovie.com

email_subject: Thank you for partnering with us!
email_body:
Partnership Confirmation

Thank you for partnering with The New Breed. Keep an eye on your inbox, we’ll be sending along promotional materials, social media posts, and updates for you to share with your audience.

In the meantime, feel free to check out our film pages to learn more about this project!

How To Access Your Digital Download

Thank you again for purchasing a digital download from our library!

This purchase has been added to your Digital Library which hold all of your purchases from our collection so you can access them for streaming or downloading anytime you wish.

 

Your Digital Library Account Details


Email: [LOGIN_EMAIL]
Link: [LIBRARY_LINK_DISPLAY]
Password: [LOGIN_PASSWORD]

Access My Library

 

Having Trouble?

If you are having trouble accessing your library first try resetting your password using the button below.

Reset My Password

If this doesn't resolve your problem please reach out to us at support@lifeismymovie.com

We hope this film helps change your life so you can in turn change the world.
Questions? Email support@lifeismymovie.com
